meanings.sent1: She found her lost ring amongst the clutter on the table.
meanings.sent2: The cat hid amongst the bushes during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was playing hide-and-seek amongst the trees.
meanings.sent4: His voice stood out amongst the chatter of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The diamond sparkled brightly amongst the other gems.

meanings.definition: Included in a group or number
meanings.sent1: She was amongst the first to arrive at the party.
meanings.sent2: The red apple was amongst the green ones in the basket.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy felt proud to be amongst the big dogs.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was amongst the best in the art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The rare stamp was amongst his prized possessions.

meanings.sent1: He walked amongst his friends at the park.
meanings.sent2: The singer stood amongst the cheering fans on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat amongst the toys, looking quite content.
meanings.sent4: The old book stood out amongst the new ones on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: The bright star shone amongst the dark sky.
